# GitHub Setup Instructions

## To push this repository to GitHub:

1. Create a new repository on GitHub (don't initialize with README, .gitignore, or license)

2. Run these commands in the capeesh folder:

```bash
cd "/Users/abdullahkutbi/Library/Mobile Documents/com~apple~CloudDocs/Personal/PCode/Projects/capeesh"

# Add the remote (replace YOUR_USERNAME and YOUR_REPO_NAME)
git remote add origin https://github.com/YOUR_USERNAME/YOUR_REPO_NAME.git

# Push to GitHub
git branch -M main
git push -u origin main
```

## Current Git Status

The repository has been initialized locally with 3 commits:
- Initial project setup
- Basic screen structure
- Rename to capeesh

All project files are contained within the `capeesh` folder.
